# commonMetadata

**Instance Property**

An array of metadata items for all common metadata keys that have a value.

## Declaration

```swift
var commonMetadata: [AVMetadataItem] { get }
```

## Accessing metadata

- **metadata**: An array of metadata stored by the track.
- **availableMetadataFormats**: An array of metadata formats available for the track.
- **metadata(forFormat:)**: Returns metadata items that a track contains for the specified format.

items.description: An array of metadata stored by the track.
items.name: metadata

items.description: An array of metadata formats available for the track.
items.name: availableMetadataFormats
